summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Bella Klein and Amanda Kirby, discussing a request for an account number related to NES. It includes references to other individuals and is marked as confidential under federal rules.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is involved in a correspondence requesting an account number.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank and is involved in the email exchange regarding the account number.

persons.name: Harry Bailer
persons.context: Harry Bailer is included in the email correspondence as a CC recipient.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also included in the email correspondence as a CC recipient.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated November 6, 2013.
Bella Klein is requesting an account number from Amanda Kirby.
Amanda Kirby is identified as an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Harry Bailer and Richard Kahn are included in the email as CC recipients.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to federal rules.
